param.name: ppenumr
param.para: Contains the address of an interface pointer.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: celt
param.para: The number of resources requested. Currently, must be 1.

param.name: psir
param.para: Receives a pointer to a structure.

param.name: pceltFetched
param.para: A pointer to the number of resources retrieved. Currently, not used.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Skips a specified number of resources.

param.name: celt
param.para: The number of resources to skip.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
